noidungservice2: Platform is a term commonly used to describe a system or platform that provides services, applications or technology to create a common working or communication environment. This can be a technology platform where different applications and services can integrate and work together. Can also be a business platform where businesses and individuals can interact to exchange information, products or services.
noidungservice3: Modern platforms often involve digital technology, which can include websites, mobile applications, cloud systems, and connectivity protocols. These platforms often create a common infrastructure, helping to optimize performance and interaction between different components. The popularity of platforms is increasing, playing an important role in supporting connectivity and integration between different systems and applications.
